entry.name: callbacks.lock
entry.title: callbacks.lock()
entry.desc: Lock a callback list in its current state.

longdesc.p: This method returns the Callbacks object onto which it is attached (this).
If the Callbacks object is created with the "memory" flag as its argument, additional functions may be added and fired after the callback list is locked.
